skills.desc: At the start of each turn, places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 20% of their MAX HP for 2 turns. Will place a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 1 turn on whichever enemy attacks this Champion.
skills.name: Thornsphere [Passive]
